name: bromfenac sodium
indications: Bromfenac ophthalmic solution is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) indicated for the treatment of postoperative inflammation and reduction of ocular pain in patients who have undergone cataract surgery. ( 1 )
contraindications: Instill one drop into the affected eye once daily beginning 1 day prior to surgery, continued on the day of surgery, and through the first 14 days post-surgery. ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions:
Bromfenac Ophthalmic Solution, 0.07% is supplied in a white low density polyethylene bottle fitted with a white low density polyethylene nozzle and sealed with grey colored high density polyethylene cap with tamper-evident ring as follows:
                  
                     1.6 mL in 5 mL      bottle (NDC 68180-433-01)
                     3      mL in a 5 mL bottle (NDC 68180-433-02) 
                  
                  
                     Storage 
                  
                  Store at 25째C (77째F); excursions permitted to 15 to 30째C (59 to 86째F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
